Text.Language: Lord God of hosts, who have set us in the inheritance of this ministry, who know the minds of men and examine hearts and reins, hear us according to the multitude of Your mercies, and cleanse us from every defilement of body and spirit; take away our sins like a cloud and our iniquities like darkness; fill us with Your power and the grace of Your only Son and the working of Your most-holy Spirit; make us sufficient that we may be ministers of Your New Covenant, so that we may be able, as befits Your holy name, to stand before You to perform the priestly ministry for Your divine mysteries; and do not abandon us to participate in the sins of others, but rather wipe out our own; and grant to us, Lord, that we may do nothing wrong through error, but give us knowledge to choose those who are worthy and to present [them] to you; and accept as a hegumen and make perfect this Your servant (â€¦..) who is here present and awaits Your heavenly gift; for You are kind and very merciful toward all who call upon You, and strong is Your power and that of Your only Son and of Your most-holy Spirit, both now â€¦

Text.Language: O Master, Lord, God the Pantocrator, the Father of our Lord, God and Savior Jesus Christ, who knows all things before they come to be. You have chosen Your servant (...) that he may be a father and a hegumen unto Your servants, who are dwelling in one place for the sake of Your holy name. Therefore, we ask and entreat You, O Lover of Mankind, behold and look upon him. Bless him and purify him through the coming upon him of Your Holy Spirit. Help him in every good deed, and give him wisdom and power through Your Holy Spirit, that he may be blameless day and night. Grant him, O our Master a governing Spirit and meekness and love and patience and goodness, that he may be pleasing unto You through good deeds, having become an example unto those who are under his rule. In doing, himself and in teaching them the ordinances of Your Law and in taking care of them in purity and love, that they may be pure and spotless.
